comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This photo was taken by Robert Runyon. See hdl.loc.gov/loc.award/txuruny.00086 It looks as though the Mexican general is Lucio Blanco (not Luis). memory.loc.gov/cgi-bin/query/p?ammem/runyon:@field(SUBJ+@... shows more pictures of Blanco, including one in the same location indicating that it is Las Rucias, Mexico. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucio_Blanco

comment.author: 35122993@N08
comment._content: Swanq: Thanks for the corrections. We will add this information to our source data so the description can get updated.
